about_me.des: I am a Full Stack engineer with website development, automation Ops and writing scripts experience. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, travel makes my life more colorful. I can make lots of friends when I coding and travel.

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.

career.research_assitant: The University of Texas at El Paso
career.research_assitant_desc: Researched semantic-based cyberinfrastructure to facilitate community engagement, problem scoping and ultimately synthesis and negotiation of scientific knowledge.
career.research_desc: Worked in an interdisciplinary and bi-national team on developing a Smart Cities solution to flooding.
career.programmer_desc: Developed, designed, and maintained projects that are used across multiple organizational units for the NASA/FDOC contract.
career.college_desc: At December 2018,I graduated from college with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.
